name: My Favorite Laptop
description: I just got a new MacBook Pro, and this has to one of my favorite laptops! There is no way I am ever going back to windows.

name: Video Game Development
description: I hear that there are some great video games coming out in 2022, and I cannot wait to play all the new single player games!

name: Data Analysis
description: I recently began a job in Data Analysis, and I couldn't be happier. If anyone is considering a job in Data Analysis and knows Python, I highliy encouraged you check out a career in that field!
